data.name: WAP端抓取规则1
data.fields: [{"name":"title","label":"标题","required":true,"selector":"//div[@class='c_c2']/h1/text()"},{"name":"content","label":"内容","required":false,"selector":"//div[@class='stepitem1']"},{"name":"publisherId","label":"发布者ID","required":true,"selector":"//a[@class='ava']/strong/text()"},{"name":"publishTime","label":"发布时间","required":false,"selector":""},{"name":"categoryId","label":"内容分类","required":false,"selector":""},{"name":"coverUrl","label":"封面图","required":false,"selector":"//div[@class='c_c1']/div[@class='img']/@style","regexFilter":"\\((http.*)\\)"},{"name":"pictureUrl","label":"详情页图片","required":false,"selector":"//div[@class='stepitem1']/img[@class='stepimg']/@src"},{"name":"summary","label":"内容摘要","required":false,"selector":"//div[@class='c_c3 hasbb1']/p[@class='cpdes']/text()"},{"name":"itemClickCnt","label":"浏览数","required":false,"selector":"//div[@class='c_c2']/span/text()","regexFilter":"([0-9]+)浏览"},{"name":"tag","label":"内容标签","required":false,"selector":"//div[@class='c_c2']/div[@class='gx']/a/text()"},{"name":"detailPage","label":"详情页","required":false,"selector":""},{"name":"nextPage","label":"下一页","required":false,"selector":""},{"name":"extra1","label":"自定义字段1","required":false,"selector":""},{"name":"extra2","label":"自定义字段2","required":false,"selector":""},{"name":"extra3","label":"自定义字段3","required":false,"selector":""},{"name":"extra4","label":"自定义字段4","required":false,"selector":""}]
